metadata.Title: CVE-2021-34119 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was discovered in htmodoc 1.9.12 in function parse_paragraph in ps-pdf.cxx ,this flaw possibly allows possible code execution and a denial of service via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: htmldoc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
